model_input:

Choice: (answer with "1", "2", or "tie")

Mentee: Mentor, I'm feeling really lonely in this new city. I don't know anyone yet and I miss my old friends.
Mentor: I understand that starting over can be tough, Mentee. But remember, this is also an opportunity for you to meet new people and make new connections.
Mentee: Yes, I know, but it's easier said than done. I feel like everyone already has their own group of friends here. 

RESPONSE 1
Mentor: It's completely normal to feel that way, Mentee. Building new friendships takes time, but I believe you'll find your place soon. Just keep being yourself and open to new experiences.
RESPONSE 2
Unknown: Mentor: I hear you, Mentee. It's completely normal to feel that way when you're in a new place. Remember, you have a unique perspective and passion for making a difference. Your dedication to promoting gender equality has already made a significant impact on so many lives. I believe that your drive and commitment will also help you connect with like-minded individuals in this new city. Just give it some time, and I'm sure you'll find your place and make new friends who appreciate your values and dedication.
